name: npm-extract
description: Simple module to extract a node module from the current path, git cloning it and then npm linking.

cwd.describe: The working directory to extract and link from.

dest.describe: The directory to clone module to.
dest.demandOption: No --dest switch given. Please supply a destination for module extraction.

id.describe: The module to clone and link.
id.demandOption: No --id switch given. Please supply a module to clone and link to.

pkfile.describe: The directory to clone to within destination directory.

repo.defaultDescription: Taken from the package file repository.url / repository.

npm.describe: The 'npm' command to use, eg: npm, yarn or pnpm .
